sections.title: Estiper for Homeowners
sections.description: Plan your renovation with clarity and peace of mind. Estiper gives you accurate, AI-powered cost estimates before you commit, helping you budget smarter and avoid surprises.

sections.title: Estiper for Real Estate Investors
sections.description: Maximize your ROI with fast, reliable renovation forecasts.
bulletPoints: Compare different renovation strategies before making a purchase.
Identify cost-effective upgrades to boost property value.

sections.title: Estiper for Contractors
sections.description: Win more clients with professional, transparent estimates.
bulletPoints: Save hours on preparing quotes with AI automation.
Provide detailed cost breakdowns your clients can trust.
Focus more on building, less on paperwork.

sections.title: What You Can Estimate
sections.description: From small updates to major renovations, Estiper covers it all:
bulletPoints: Interior and exterior upgrades, landscaping, and more.

sections.title: How Estiper Works
sections.description: Get your estimate in just a few steps:
bulletPoints: Answer targeted questions about your renovation plans.
Upload a floor plan for more precise results.
Receive a detailed breakdown of materials and labor costs instantly.

sections.title: What Sets Estiper Apart
sections.description: Estiper combines cutting-edge AI with market-specific data to deliver the most accurate renovation estimates. Easy to use, fast to deliver, and tailored to your needs â€” all while keeping your data secure.
